response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me and has the potential to significantly benefit you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this unique item to you at a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also acknowledges its potential impact on your endeavors. I believe it strikes a fair balance between the value I place on it and the substantial benefits it could bring to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
